title: Recipes-n-Ratings.
description: Cleaned and engineered features on 230,000+ recipes to create a regression model with nutritional data and hashtags for optimization.

title: Fantasy Sports Assistant.
description: Built software using ESPN Fantasy API to analyze trades, rank draft prospects, suggest replacements, and optimize matchups.

title: BikeWatching.
description: A data visualization project built in JavaScript to visualize bike traffic in the Boston area.

title: Criminal Justice with AI.
description: Used COMPAS data to predict recidivism rates and reduce human bias in jail sentencing through AI-driven analysis.

title: Personal Website.
description: Created a website using Astro Framework to showcase work experience, projects, and a blog on course takeaways.

title: Home Foresting.
description: Designed a platform to share my rare-plant hobby and provide resources on growing rare fruiting plants.

title: SongSpace.
description: Built a Spotify prototype using Python Flask, SQL, and HTML, allowing users to log in, upload, and stream music.

title: MiniGit (IP).

title: WebCrawler.

title: Image Classification App.
description: Created a Python application for image processing, with features like rotation, blurring, and color adjustments.

title: Meteorite Landings.
description: Analyzed NASA's meteorite dataset using pandas to explore patterns and trends in landings over time.

title: Song Recommender App.

title: DS3 Site.
